item.title: Mariachi Legends launches in 2026 for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

New Metroidvania game from 9 Years of Shadows developer.

Pixel art, combat-oriented, side-scrolling Metroidvania game Mariachi Legends will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam in 2026, developer Halberd Studios announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Mariachi Legends is a brutal, pixel art, combat-oriented Metroidvania set in the heart of Mexico. You play as Pablo Cruz, a detective who has agreed to a deal with Death herself. She has given Pablo the ability to transform into the mighty La Sombra, allowing him to fight back against the criminals encroaching on his hometown. In return, Pablo has vowed to bring Madre Catrina the one thing that has eluded her grasp: the man who defied her power and became immortal.

Versatile and Supernatural Combat

  • Test your reflexes and showcase your unique fighting style as you loot and level up.
  • Perfect your parry skills and enjoy the brutal combat filled with finishers.
  • Find and equip a vast array of weapons and sub-weapons to personalize your fighting style. From guns and swords to whips and magical casts, venturing through the alleys is sure to prove dynamic!
  • Constantly obtain new abilities that will make you even more powerful as the story unfolds.

The Colorful and Rowdy Neighborhood

Welcome to Santa Mascota, a small town known for it’s lively streets, colorful residents and, most recently, a streak of bad luck laced with danger.

Somebody has to bring Santa Mascota’s good fortune back, and you’re best suited given your track-record.

  • Embrace your detective skills to find abandoned corpses, interrogate suspects and ultimately solve the mystery surrounding several deaths in town.
  • Watch as your hometown becomes alive and the townsfolk will open shops, share a drink, and even offer challenging side-quests.

Fortune Favors the Bold

  • Have your fortune told by Madre Catrina at the beginning of the game to determine your unique circumstances and abilities.
  • In the game, look for several Tarot cards during your journey and explore the different sorts of power they can provide. Find them all and become unstoppable.

Adventure Around the Clock

  • Explore a giant dual map that turns familiar paths into renewed challenges.
  • The Day, Night, and Full Moon System offers numerous opportunities to revisit locations, each time with distinctive changes that renew your experience and redefine entire areas.
  • Locate Sun and Moon gates and interact with them at the right time to unlock hidden areas and coveted collectables. And if you can brave those areas at night, you’ll find yourself hunted by all manner of nocturnal creatures that inject new life into conquered territories, reshaping your adventure.

A Palate’s Delight

  • Discover recipes, collect ingredients, cook dishes and persuade NPCs.
  • Explore the world around you to collect a variety of ingredients featured in Mexican cuisine and prepare traditional dishes to honor your ancestors.
  • Find strength and power to help in your mission in every dish.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: 2D platforming boss-rush action game Onikura to be published by Astrolabe Games
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Due out in the second half of 2026.

Astrolabe Games will publish Too Dark Games-developed 2D platforming boss-rush action game Onikura when it launches for PC via Steam in the second half of 2026, the companies announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Astrolabe Games:

About

Onikura is a 2D platforming boss-rush action game built around lightning-fast slashes and surgically precise parry actions.

Every clash is a battle for survival—attack, parry, heal, and consume souls to unleash the Samurai’s divine techniques. Each action demands purpose; every misstep can be fatal.

After each victory, choose your next path and grow stronger. The mightier you become, the deadlier your future foes will be.

Story

Since the day Onis rose from the depths of hell, calamity has plagued the land. Even on the rare occasion that one was slain, its soul would simply return to a new body, and the endless cycle of death and devastation continued without pause.

Amid this despair, a divine Sakura tree took root. Blessed by the Gods, this sacred tree is a divine vessel capable of sealing Oni souls and preventing their rebirth. This miracle came to be known as Onikura.

But the Onis still need to be defeated, so brave warriors from every corner of the land took up their swords and set out to destroy the Oni and deliver their souls to the great Sakura tree. But none ever returned—but one.

You are Tensai, the final Onikura Samurai—a human-god resonance born at the village where the divine Sakura tree took root. Your sword is the world’s last hope. You will hunt down the remaining Onis, seal their corrupted souls within Onikura, and bring an end to the cycle once and for all.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Gameplay

Every time an Oni is sealed, its soul is purified by the divine Sakura tree, transforming into Omamori—talismans that bless Tensai with unique abilities.

Before each encounter, freely combine Omamori to forge your own combat style. Will you master flawless parries, sacrifice your life in exchange for deadly strikes, or channel spiritual energy to control the arena from afar?

There is no ultimate build—only your path as the true Onikura Samurai.

Art Style

Featuring meticulously hand-crafted, high-frame pixel art, Onikura fuses oriental elegance with a haunting post-apocalyptic world set in Ancient Japan.

Every duel with the Oni unfolds in a special arena—ruined shrines, war-torn villages, and blood-soaked sakura groves. Each Oni carries its own backstory. Beneath the petals of the divine Sakura Tree, only your brave sword can decide the fate of the world.

item.title: Letters to Arralla coming to Switch in Q1 2026
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

Currently available for PC.

Little Pink Clouds will release Australian island-set mail delivery adventure game Letters to Arralla for Switch in Q1 2026, the developer announced.

Letters to Arralla first launched for PC via Steam on September 15.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Play as a turnip with a big juicy bum delivering mail to a cast of colorful characters on an Australian island. Get the mail where it needs to go by reading residents’ letters, solving puzzles, and exploring the island’s sun-soaked beaches.

Key Features

  • Read All the Mail! (This Is Very Illegal in Real Life) – The best part of delivering mail? You can open every single letter and look through everyone’s business! Whilst in the real world this is a crime, on Arralla Isle it’s perfectly acceptable, and even encouraged!
  • Solve Visual Puzzles – At the Arralla Isle Deliberry service, you’ll have to solve where each letter goes through pictograms drawn on each envelope – and they’re not always obvious!
  • Help the Residents – Learn of the island residents’ interpersonal problems through reading their mail – they will need your help to resolve them! Meet big booty cutie fruits like grouchy glassblowers, silly scientists, and deliver seriously creepy letters to an ominous house on a hill…
  • Relax and Explore – On Arralla Isle, there’s no rush. The pace is slow, like a lazy summer day, so you can relax while you play. Exploration is a treat in this beautiful Australian landscape.
  • Get Cheeky! – Snap photos, kick over chessboard pieces, read about Arralla Isle’s history, throw stuff, discover secrets. The island is your oyster. You can even call your mum!

There’s plenty to do as a mail delivery turnip on Arralla Isle!

Watch the announcement trailer below.
